MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH22 postcode area of Dalkeith, affecting properties in Oak Crescent and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.41pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived Mayfield Factory substation and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a suspected blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.14pm on Saturday 27th February 2021.
